Articles.Content:
A small, innocuous drone quietly plucks the cookie from your outstretched hand and deposits it in mine.

My cookie.
I use a net on small, innocuous drone before it reaches your hand. My cookie.

K'thulhu wakes up.

No world. No cookie. Only K'thulhu.

Steve, from Irregular Webcomics, wrestles him to death, and I bake a new cookie batch, and share some with him.

Steve and My cookies.

You mean "Our cookies"?

 

Anyway, I use a tractor beam to steal the remaining 10 cookies (you each ate 1) aboard my ship and warp away to Kerbin where I share it to Val and The Original 3.

Our cookies.

The Kraken attacks. All of you are flung out of the system at light speed, leaving the cookies behind.

my cookies.

Due to the relativity, time passes, cookies get relic and hide in background radiation.

Hidden cookies.

HACKZORZ Ltd. breaks the universe and gives me the hidden cookies.

My slightly hidden cookies.

Edited May 7, 2017 by qzgy

I board a new warp ship and steal the cookies. Then I go to Kerbin and THEN share it with the four.

 

Our cookies again.

Your warp drive caused the "cause/effect" problems.

The cookies were yours in past. Now they get un-yours-ed.

SCP foundation cookies.

I go and steal them from the SCP foundation.

My cookies.. wait...

 

THEN I go share it with the four.

Our cookies.

I quickly drive by in a car and steal Val's cookie

My cookie now Ill eat it.

I take it out of your hands before you can eat it. 

My cookie.

I steal the cookie and now my 10 cookies are safe. 

THEN,  I will share it with the four.

Our cookies.

The four are launched out of the solar system at more than the speed of light because of a Kraken attack, and you accidentally hit F5. You go and repeatedly apply your head to a wall with force while I claim the cookies. 

My cookies.

I Alt+F5'd the moment before the Kraken Attack, so I get a redo.

 

Our cookies again.

The Kraken attack happens again anyway. You give up with physics and throw the cookies away, except I catch them before they are in the garbage.

My cookies

Slowly you are starting to understand that the cookie is not that simple, it can't be just thrown away. (Like the Sauron's Ring).
It's a mysterious artefact, and you would...

... Too late....
SCP Foundation's SWAT kidnaps you, and you get contained as an SCP sub-artefact (level — Safe), secondary to the Undroppable Cookie.artefact (level - Euclid/Kether, due to the Kraken call),

SCP Foundation's you and cookie.

Edited May 9, 2017 by kerbiloid

I steal it.

My cookies.

Edited May 9, 2017 by Joseph Kerman

I dig a tunnel under you and anger the kraken and run. you are thrown in the air and the cookies land in my hand.

MY COOKIES,  I ATE THEM ALREADY.

I open you up, dissect your stomach, isolate the cookie particles, and reassemble it.

 

My cookies.

omg.

I cut your neck off before the cookies go down it.

My cookies.

Alt-F9

My cookies.

wha

ok then

I do alt-F9

My cookies.

I quit the game, taking the cookies with me.

The game fails to close, leaving you stuck in one spot with your cookie. I take the cookie from you, alt F5, and kill the game using task manager.

My cookie.
